text:
Defensive Power: Light Arrow
Supershot: Flaming Arrow
Special Attributes: Flaming Arrow deals high damage

Defensive Power: Cannonball
Supershot: Flaming Cannonball
Special Attributes: Flaming Cannonballs break all Shield spells
High damage and durability with short range. Supershot stuns dragon temporarily.

Defensive Power: Electricity
Supershot: Superpowered Lightning
Special Attributes: Nearby Lightning Towers increase damage

Defensive Power: Red Spell Block
Supershot: Drain Rage
Special Attributes: Stops Red spells from affecting nearby buildings, Drain Rage stops Dragon from gaining Rage

Defensive Power: Blue Spell Block
Supershot: Drain Rage
Special Attributes: Blocks Blue Spells from being used, Drain Rage stops Dragon from gaining Rage

Defensive Power: Poisoned Dart
Supershot: Poisoned Javelin
Special Attributes: Poison drains health over time

Defensive Power: Boulder
Supershot: Giant Boulder
Special Attributes: Giant Boulder stuns the Dragon for a few seconds

Defensive Power: Prism
Supershot: Decoy Shield
Special Attributes: Decoy Shield protects surrounding towers

Defensive Power: Vortex
Supershot: Protective Shield
Special Attributes: Vortex sucks health and steals medals, Protective Shield makes surrounding towers invincible
Provides Food to train and attack with dragons.

Hatches eggs.
Upgrade to hatch rare eggs.
Looked over by the Dragon Keepers, an ancient order of monks dedicated to the training, breeding, and healing of dragons.

Houses dragons, who are stabled in the catacombs far beneath its entrance.
Train and Heal dragons here.
Produces the lumber for your buildings and towers.

Produces the stone for your buildings and towers.
Production increased by upgrading and research.
The Copper Mine produces the copper for your buildings and towers.

Perhaps one of the most interesting parts of strategic base defense, the Migration Station allows you to discover, unlock and move your base to new locations.   As we discover new lands, our cartographers constantly revise their maps.   These researchers provide information on the tradeoffs of different layouts and plan the migration from base to base.

Strategize, declare wars, and communicate with your team.
Join new teams and approve new team members.
Teams consist of a leader, a set of officers, and normal members. Leaders are in charge of modifying team information and can also promote and kick anyone out.

Houses your builders.
Upgrade to increase the level that your builders can upgrade to.

Stores resources.
Upgrade to increase storage limit.
Research improvements to your dragons and base.

Defensive Power: Light Arrow
Supershot: Flaming Arrow
Special Attributes: Flaming Arrow deals high damage

Defensive Power: Cannonball
Supershot: Flaming Cannonball
Special Attributes: Flaming Cannonballs break all Shield spells

Defensive Power: Electricity
Supershot: Superpowered Lightning
Special Attributes: Nearby Lightning Towers increase damage

Where dragon eggs are bred.
Looked over by the Dragon Keepers, an ancient order of monks dedicated to the training, breeding, and healing of dragons.
Make boosts that help your dragons, defenses, builders, and trainers.

The Shrine has the ability to summon the Water Dragon.
If you or your guild members pay homage to the Water Dragon by successfully actively shooting down %d dragons in his name, he will fight for you.
The Shrine has already summoned the Water Dragon. You may use it for %d attacks.
The Shrine has summoned the Water Dragon to your army. He can be used for %d attacks.
Summons the Water Dragon in return for strong defense.
Watches over your kingdom and dragons.
A beacon to visiting guild members, and a warning to foes.
Watches over your kingdom and dragons.
Serves as a monument to knowledge and research.
Serves as a meeting place for civilian farmers and laborers.
A sacred lookout where only dragons may go.
Provides a strategic vantage point for sighting enemy attackers.
Upgrade Sheep Farm to increase your meat production.
Reduces damage from dragons of this element
Upgrade Lumber Mill to increase your lumber production.
Upgrade Incubator to incubate more advanced eggs.
Upgrade Breeding Castle to crossbreed more advanced dragons.
Upgrade Stable to train dragons to a higher level.
Upgrade Builder Hut to unlock more powerful buildings!
Upgrade Storage Hut to increase the amount of total resources you can hold.
Upgrade Hall of Research to gain access to the next tier of research.
Upgrade the Forge to be able to create more powerful boosts.
Deals damage to all buildings in the affected area
Increase the damage of this and the next dragon to attack
Lose health. Increased attack & rage generation. Destroying towers grants health.
Alters the nature of your other spells to heal or generate rage
Strikes buildings with lightning that chains randomly
Strikes buildings with super destructive lightning that chains randomly
Absorbs damage until depleted then explodes damaging buildings
Absorbs huge damage then explodes massively damaging buildings
Dragon becomes invisible and cannot be targeted until it attacks
Several shards of ice protect you
When Celestial Dance is used, removes all debuffs if HP is higher than 50%
Consumes all Hunter ammo then heals based on Hunter ammo spent.
Absorb solar energy from destroyed buildings
Cloaks dragon and deals area damage.
Dragon moves quickly over buildings with a chance to dodge attacks
Inflict nearby buildings with Gloom Clouds and increase their damage taken
When active gain health and rage on building destruction
Absorbs damage then temporarily increases attack power after shield duration
Damages and freezes all towers within range. Towers take additional damage after being frozen.
Freezes all buildings in the affected area
Dragon deals greatly increased damage with its attacks
Fireball attacks embed Icy Shards in buildings that increase damage inflicted.
Freezes towers and gain shield based on the number of hit towers.
Buildings hit by Doom Chains are shackled and unable to attack
Deflect trebuchet balls to stun neighboring towers
Places a mark on a building that heals the Dragon that destroys it
Reduce incoming damage and restore some health
Reduce incoming damage 60% and heal for 10%
Increase your flamethrower's damage for a short time
Dragon's next attack deals enough damage to destroy most buildings instantly
Deals damage to buildings nearby and reduces their damage for entire fight
Reflects incoming projectiles back onto the attackers
Briefly weaken chosen tower and greatly weaken nearby towers.
Dragon self destructs and deals tremendous damage to every tower in the area
Disables a building until the next time it takes damage
Disables a building for a short duration, or until it takes damage
Attack inflicts poisonous Gloom Clouds on damaged buildings
Opens a vortex that absorbs all damage from projectiles
Invincible shield that creates Heal Marks or Rage Marks when destroyed.
Invincible shield that creates Heal Marks when destroyed
Deals area damage. Gain invincibility, health and rage. Used once only.
Unleash the fury of the sun to transform!
Dragon takes damage and gains rage immediately
Increases attack damage.  Recast to shock and stun nearby towers.
Dragon cloaks and recovers Hunter ammo. After cloak duration, damages nearby towers and gains damage boost.
Shatter any frozen buildings to deal damage and regenerate Hunter ammo.
Causes Storm towers, Lightning towers, Fire/Ice turrets to attack each other.
Deals damage to buildings and restore Health or Rage
Deals damage to buildings and restore Rage.
Deals damage to buildings and restore Health.
At low dragon HP, attacks embed fire that increase damage inflicted.
Gain rage and a spell from the last tower your dragon destroyed.
Summons a spectral Warrior Dragon to fight for you
Freezes buildings in a large area AND penetrates Red Mage Towers!
Dragon teleports past an entire island
Summons a cloud that brings down lightning bolts which does damage over time
Sends a spike of dark energy at a targeted building
After death dragon can keep attacking with increased damage and Hunter ammo regeneration.
{USERNAME} was automatically kicked from the team for having inactive status for too many days.
{USERNAME} has been accepted into a new guild and is no longer a member of this team
{USERNAME} has accepted the invitation and is now a member of the team. Welcome your new teammate!
{USERNAME} has joined the team. Welcome your new teammate!
{USERNAME1} has been accepted to the team by {USERNAME2}. Welcome your new teammate!
{USERNAME} ({GUILDNAME}) has declared war on your team!
The war your team started with {GUILDNAME} starts in {TIMEREMAINING} minutes!
The war with {GUILDNAME} starts in {TIMEREMAINING} minutes!
Your team has won the war against {GUILDNAME}!
Your team has lost the war against {GUILDNAME}!
Your team has tied the war against {GUILDNAME}!
{USERNAME} has put your fortress on lockdown! Enjoy the brief respite from war -- it will not come under siege this next round.
Your fortress lockdown period has ended.
Your team overwhelmed the enemy and captured their fortress. You now own the BEST fortress!
Your team overwhelmed the enemy and captured their fortress. You now own a level {FORTRESSLEVEL} fortress!
Your team held off the invaders and continues to control the BEST fortress!
Your team held off the invaders and will remain in your current fortress. Do better next round to win a better fortress.
Your team's fortress assault was repelled. Regroup and try again!
Your team's fortress has fallen to a stronger foe. Your fortress level is now {FORTRESSLEVEL}.
Your team's fortress is on lockdown! Enjoy the respite -- no skirmish this round.
{USERNAME} has defeated the enemy's Flag Bearer!
{USERNAME} has declared a Skirmish!  Your team will be matched at the top of the next hour!
Your team's skirmish with {GUILDNAME} is about to begin!
Your team's skirmish with {GUILDNAME} has ended.  Your team won by a score of {SCORE1} to {SCORE2}. Your team wins {EXTRAPERCENT}% extra points ({EXTRAPOINTS}) for winning!
Your team's skirmish with {GUILDNAME} has ended.  Your team lost by a score of {SCORE1} to {SCORE2}.
Your team's skirmish with {GUILDNAME} has ended.  Your team tied by a score of {SCORE1} to {SCORE2}.
The war will begin in {HOURS} hours. The team that acquires more flames in battle shall win. Prepare your dragons and strengthen your defenses! Good Luck
The war your team started with {GUILDNAME} is cancelled.
All members of {GUILDNAME} left the team. Therefore, the war your team started with that team is cancelled.
All members of {GUILDNAME} left the team. Therefore, the war your team started with that team is cancelled. We refunded {MEDALS} medals back to your team.
Your team has TIED the war against {GUILDNAME}. Your score was {SCORE1} and their score was {SCORE2}.
Your team has WON the war against {GUILDNAME}. Your score was {SCORE1} and their score was {SCORE2}. Your team has won {NUMTOKENS} gold egg tokens.
Your team has LOST the war against {GUILDNAME}. Your score was {SCORE1} and their score was {SCORE2}. Your team has lost {NUMTOKENS} gold egg tokens.

Congratulations, your team's performance in the event earned it {POINTS} rating points! Your team ranked {MYRANK} in the event. This performance was on par with a team with {OPPONENTRATING} rating (which was ranked {OPPONENTRANK} in the overall team rating leaderboard when the event ended). Your team's rating has been adjusted to reflect its performance in this event. It is now {NEWRATING}.

Unfortunately, your team's performance in the event cost it {POINTS} rating points! Your team ranked {MYRANK} in the event. This performance was on par with a team with {OPPONENTRATING} rating (which was ranked {OPPONENTRANK} in the overall team rating leaderboard when the event ended). Your team's rating has been adjusted to reflect its performance in this event. It is now {NEWRATING}.

Your team's performance in the event did not affect its rating. Your team ranked {MYRANK} in the event. This performance was on par with a team with {OPPONENTRATING} rating (which was ranked {OPPONENTRANK} in the overall team rating leaderboard when the event ended). Your team's rating has been adjusted to reflect its performance in this event. It is now {NEWRATING}.
Skirmish opponent could not be found
Your team was the odd one out. Next hour perhaps.
Your team has been demoted to {NEWLEAGUE}! You will now get {NUMTOKENS} tokens per day and easier enemies. To reach {NEXTLEAGUE}, you need {RATING} rating.
Congratulations! Your team has been promoted to {NEWLEAGUE}! You will now get {NUMTOKENS} tokens per day and harder enemies.
Congratulations! Your team has been promoted to {NEWLEAGUE}! You will now get {NUMTOKENS} tokens per day and harder enemies. To reach {NEXTLEAGUE}, you need {RATING} rating.
{USERNAME1} is transferring {LUMBER} lumber and {FOOD} food to {USERNAME2}. Transfer will be done in {MINUTES} minutes and {SECONDS} seconds.
{USERNAME1} is transferring {LUMBER} lumber and {GOLD} gold to {USERNAME2}. Transfer will be done in {MINUTES} minutes and {SECONDS} seconds.
{USERNAME1} is transferring {FOOD} food and {GOLD} gold to {USERNAME2}. Transfer will be done in {MINUTES} minutes and {SECONDS} seconds.

{USERNAME1} transferred {LUMBER} lumber {GOLD} gold and {FOOD} food to {USERNAME2}.
{USERNAME} from {GUILDNAME1} has declared war on {GUILDNAME2}. It begins in {HOURS} hours.
{GUILDNAME1} has won the war against {GUILDNAME2}. {GUILDNAME1} jumped from {OLDRANK} to {NEWRANK} in the division and stole {TOKENSWON} breeding tokens.
{GUILDNAME1} has won the war against {GUILDNAME2}. {GUILDNAME1} jumped from {OLDRANK} to {NEWRANK} in the division.

{USERNAME} has been kicked from the group
{USERNAME} has declined to join the group
Slows dragon's Hunter ammo regeneration and shields other towers!
Overloads and explodes one nearby tower!
High Damage to One Tower.  Recast to regain rage at cost of health.
If dragon dies during duration, explodes back to life!
If dragon dies during duration, explodes back to life!
{NAME} toggled the Castle Shield OFF at castle {CASTLENAME} (X:{X} Y:{Y}). Cooldown expires in {HOURS} hours and {MINUTES} minutes.
{NAME} toggled the Castle Shield OFF at castle {CASTLENAME} (X:{X} Y:{Y}).

Your team has conquered castle {NAME} and evicted {ENEMY}.

Super Shot Burns and Increases All Damage Dealt to Dragon!
The Bounty Harbor provides a bonus reward each day you check-in, with better rewards for longer streaks!
TIP: To gift to a player not on your team, visit their player profile page and hit the gift button!
Engulf an enemy tower in constricting sand
Weakens towers and second cast destroys affected towers
Grants Temporal Shards, used to cast Rewind or stay alive for several seconds after death.
Become invulnerable. Can cast spells and activate Rewind to return to original location.
Summons Apophet's Shadow to fight and return some of the damage dealt to Apophet as health healed.
Increases Rage Generation rate and empowers next ability.
Freezes and damages buildings in the affected area
Clear the entire island of forests to enable this dragon perch. Once your dragon perch is built you can station your dragons on it to help you defend your base.
Open %ld Silver Chests for bonus Epic or Legendary Rune
Open %ld Gold Chests for a Legendary Drop
Open %ld Bronze Chests for a Legendary Drop
You currently don't have any items to salvage. Play events, attack players, forge boosts, or buy value packs in the store to acquire more items!
Tap a category above to see boosts you can salvage.
Restores a large amount of health over time
Increase your flamethrower's damage for a short time by 65%
Traps and damages towers. Gain shield based on the number of hit towers.
Deals damage to nearby buildings and reduces their damage for entire battle.
Traps and damages all buildings in targeted area.
Destroys targeted tower and heals dragon.
Toggle on for a shielded assault boost
Absorbs damage until depleted, then explodes
Takes no damage from elemental attacks. Heals based on elemental damage received.
Your status is now "low activity". This may affect your guild eligibility! See mail for tips on how to improve status.
Strikes buildings with lightning that chains randomly
Summons a Hellspawn Warrior Dragon to fight for you.
Provides resistance to Dark Flak Resist.
Blinds towers to dodge all non-beam attacks. Dragon moves slower.
Gain rage and a spell from the last tower your dragon destroyed.
Deal area damage and gain reduced Hunter ammo cost at reduced damage.
Passive Summoned Dodo Guardian. Absorbs damage and increases rage generation.
Absorbs damage until depleted, then explodes
Elemental Damage. Supershot reduces dragon damage by 50% for 2.5 seconds. On destruction explodes and deals damage.
Invincible shield that creates Rage marks on towers when destroyed
Attack inflicts clouds of decay on targeted buildings for short duration.
Deflects incoming projectiles and mage tower shots for 4.5 seconds
Dragon's next attack deals enough damage to destroy most buildings instantly
Produces the gold mined from Atlas

A crackling shield of electricity that absorbs damage until depleted, then explodes
Please finish your pending transaction first!
You finished tutorial! Do you want to resume your transaction from App Store?
This place is already your home. You can move your home to any neutral castle or any castle your team controls.
Enemy Primarch(s) have this location locked down. You must destroy them first.
You must be on a team to do this.
You must move your Primarch here to conquer this territory. Try To Move Now.
Please select a Primarch before performing this operation
Castle has been destroyed and no longer available
Castle %@now belongs to your team. Congratulations!
Map data is not loaded yet
Primarch is not placed in the world
Combat is not allowed in this safe zone.
You may not attack your team's members.
PvP is currently disabled. Fight in: %@
Your Primarch has been trapped! Attack the Trapper which trapped your Primarch to get it free first.
Oops, you're trying to transfer from your selected Primarch to itself! Please choose a castle or another Primarch you own that you would like to transfer troops and resources with.
Your trap ability is on cooldown. You can trap again in %d seconds
You cannot trap Primarchs while you are traveling through a chokepoint.
You cannot trap Primarchs while they are traveling through a chokepoint.
You can only trap Primarchs in the same region.
Enemy Primarch(s) have this location locked down. You must destroy them first.
This poacher is currently spawning. You will be able to attack it after it finishes spawning.
You have no Primarch. Please summon one in order move.

Your Primarch is not moving. Use the 'Move Now' option to immediately start moving to a new location. After you're en route, you can use this 'Move Next' option to add additional waypoints to your route.
You must move your Primarch here to attack. Try Move Now.
Enemy Primarch(s) have this location locked down. You must destroy them first.
You must move your Primarch here to do this. Try Move Now
You must have a Primarch selected to do this.
Only the team which owns this castle may donate to this castle's team bank.
You cannot transfer troops to an enemy Barracks
You can't conquer this castle until the shield dissipates.
This castle has taken serious damage. Shield dissipates in: %@
Portal does not have enough energy
An ongoing events protects all castle from attack. Have fun playing the event without worrying about your castle falling prey to enemies!
An enemy %@ blocks you from attacking your target. Do you want to attack the %@ blocking you instead?
You have already defeated a poacher here. Get your teammates to help defeat the other poacher members (like war, each team member can only scratch off one poacher)!
Do you want to attack this player?
This area is still controlled by Kharnyx and not available as part of the Atlas. Please look somewhere safer!
Enemy Primarch(s) have this portal locked down. You must destroy them first.
You must move your Primarch to the Portal in order to use it. Try Move Now.
This is a No Man's Land. You cannot conquer these ruins.
Cannot attack ally players, please try other castles.
Sorry, your attempt to trap an enemy failed. Please try again later
This portal has disappeared back into the ether.
You were attacked near {{contname}} by {{attacker}} of {{teamname}}. Your Primarch earned {{gloryamount}} glory. Go to your battle reports to view the details.
The poacher in region {{region}} has finished spawning. You can attack it with your Primarch now.
Your Primarch has been freed, please summon a new one
Cannot Summon. Enemy Primarch(s) are at this location.
The poacher in region {{region}} was defeated before you could complete your attack.
You cannot move your primarch now because you are trapped by a Trapper
Turn health into attack & rage. Destroy towers to gain health.
The dragon's savage nature grants it faster rage regeneration

How much gold you can win from a mine increases as your team conquers more territory and upgrades its Banks. The amount of bonus XP you can earn increases as your team conquers more territory and upgrades its HQs.
If your team defeats more of this poacher's members than any other team, you will earn up +%ld%% extra loot. Maximum loot is earned if your team defeats ALL of this poacher's members.
Sorry, we were unable process your request. Please try again, or contact support if this problem persists.
The route you have selected includes an enemy blockade where your primarch will be delayed. Are you sure you want to continue with this move?
You cannot summon a primarch while an enemy primarch is at your home.
infrastructure must be online to summon.
This castle is protected by enemy Primarchs. You must destroy them before you can attack this castle.
You must be in the same region to attack a beast or mine.
You must first be in the same region as the portal in order to move to it.
The poacher in region {{region}} has escaped. Rally your team to fully defeat the poacher next time. All poachers must be beaten by your team in order to earn its loot!
You earned rider gear crafting material bonus loot because your team defeated the majority of a poacher in region {{region}}.

You earned rider gear crafting material bonus loot because your team defeated the majority of a poacher in region {{region}}. Your team only defeated {{numScratches}} of the {{numPoacherFleets}} poacher members. Defeat all of the poacher members to get {{missedPercent}}% more bonus loot.
{{name}} of {{team}} stole the poacher you defeated in region {{region}}.
Bonus loot was sent to your team's bank because your team defeated the daily team beast.
The beast escaped before your attack was completed. Please attack another beast.
The beast escaped before your attack was completed. Please attack another beast.

You already scratched this team beast slot.
Your team already defeated this team beast.
Blocks all projectile damage. Reduces beam attack damage.
While active, gain health and rage for each tower destroyed.
Gains Rage but slows regen rate. Gain health on building destruction.

Instantly shoot multiple magic projectiles at targets in front.
